txt.en: Cadi has asked you to collect beech nuts around Wylvenclove, north-west of Herne.
The beech seeds have been harvested.\n\nYou should talk to Cadi.
A few seeds may become the start of something new.
You have collected a number of beech nuts for Cadi.\n\nShe waits in Rendal's home in the south-west corner of Herne.

'Oh, you found a lot!'

Cadi eagerly takes the beech nuts from you and spreads them out onto the table.

'I take half, and you take half. If you don't know how to get the seeds out, I'll teach you!'
'When Mister Rendal comes back, I'm going to plant so many trees with him!' Cadi beams.\n\n'Thank you!'
You should help Cadi harvest seeds from the beech nuts.

'You're an adventurer, aren't you? Just like Mister Rendal. He warned me to stay away from the beech trees in Wylvenclove because of the wolves... but wolves aren't scary for you, right?

'Wylvenclove is that way! Um... is that north-west?

'There must be lots of beech nuts on the ground there. And then, and then -- after you come back, we can take the seeds out together!'
